item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @qadh qadh
item.description:
@qadh wrote:

Well im not gonna get to far into detail but heres some mild cc

  1. The chairs, instead of legs let them sit on the ground like a normal booth
  2. Add better textures, and if those chairs are made of fabric lets see some wrinkles
  3. Round the tops of the stools those would hurt your ass
  4. [quote=“reyx7, post:2, topic:336545”]Here is some CC
    1.You have no floor? No walls? Not a restaurant yet.
    2.You booths, the bottom (sitting part) and the part where is back is don’t line up at all.
    3.Change the projection of your textures so that it covers the rest of the tables.
    4.The booth chairs appear as if the legs would collapse at any second.
    Fix those things. Also, what is the face count? As one object idk if this would fix into an rs client.
    5/10.[/quote]
    What he said
    So it should be nicer after that.

Read full topic

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Here is some CC
1.You have no floor? No walls? Not a restaurant yet.
2.You booths, the bottom (sitting part) and the part where is back is don’t line up at all.
3.Change the projection of your textures so that it covers the rest of the tables.
4.The booth chairs appear as if the legs would collapse at any second.
Fix those things. Also, what is the face count? As one object idk if this would fix into an rs client.
5/10.

Read full topic
